title: Melanie Verwoerd is right about Ramaphosa
text:
Dear Melanie Verwoerd,

I always enjoy reading your articles, which are, I believe extremely accurate regarding the state of affairs here. Your article about Ramaphosa’s inability to reverse the catastrophe this country has become hit the nail on the head.

My bigger long term concern is that Cyril’s time is limited – given the power play within the ANC he could be ousted at any time, even assassinated, the way politicians are being removed these days.

I believe Cyril is the last hope for this country and that he is all that stands between us and a bunch of ANC rogues who, if and when he goes will be the final nail in the coffin. I don’t see any quality leadership coming up through the ranks, and inevitably it will be a free for all, even worse than state capture.

This is why I will be leaving the shores of this country in the next year or two. No NHI for me!

Keep up the great realistic reporting!

Nick French
